pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/d2a.svg :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/d2a.. image:: https://github.com/walkframe/d2a/workflows/build/badge.svg?branch=master :target: https://github.com/walkframe/d2a/actions.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/d2a.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/d2a/.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg :target: https://opensource.org/licenses/MITRequirements============- Python: 3.5 or later. - Tested with 3.6, 3.9- Django: 2.x, 3.x - Tested with 2.2.9, 3.0.1, 3.1.1- SQLAlchemy: 1.1 or later. - Tested with 1.1.0, 1.4.12 STEPS TO USE==============Installation-------------.. code-block:: shell $ pip install d2a -UAdd d2a to settings.INSTALLED_APPS... code-block:: python3 INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', # : # : 'd2a', ]Code generation---------------.. code-block:: shell $ ./manage.py sqla_codegenLink==================- `PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/d2a>`__- See more details on `walkframe docs <https://docs.walkframe.com/products/d2a/>`__ - `History <https://docs.walkframe.com/products/d2a/history/>`__
